name: files-and-folders-mr
description: Files and Folders project with Angular and NestJS

scripts.build: pnpm build:fnf-data && pnpm build:fnf && pnpm build:fnf-api
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter fnf-data install && pnpm --filter fnf install && pnpm --filter fnf-api install
scripts.docker:kill2: docker kill $(docker ps | grep  ' krocon/files-and-folders-mr ' | awk '{ print $1 }')
scripts.docker:remove: docker stop fnf && docker container rm fnf && docker image rm krocon/files-and-folders-mr -f
scripts.docker:print-container-id: docker ps | grep  ' krocon/files-and-folders-mr ' | awk '{ print $1 }'
scripts.docker:logs: docker logs $(docker ps | grep  ' krocon/files-and-folders-mr ' | awk '{ print $1 }')
